name: Find a Coin, While There's Storm
name_original: Find a Coin, While There's Storm
description:
HOW TO PLAY:
1) If you want to weather the storm:
* Wait 165 seconds
* Hide in trashcan, before black things appear
* Don't hide forever
2) If you want to find a coin:
* Go in green building
* Activate the lever to off laser
* Don't touch red balls
* Grab a coin
